mapper.insert:
insert into entity (entity_name, put_all_id, pid, ad_position, template_id, entity_title, ad_id, entity_desc, entity_url, run_state, entity_state, audit_user, industry, audit_comments, audit_time, create_user, create_time, update_time, user_name, thread_title, thread_pic1, thread_pic2, thread_pic3, dynamic_code, thread_content, thread_url_text, recommend_name, recommend_link, custom_css, user_portrait, pop_window_text, button_text, label_title, label_visible, goods_style, ext_id, ext_ids, entity_type, dataRate, thread_pic4, thread_pic5, thread_pic6, thread_pic7, thread_pic8, thread_pic9, land1, land2, land3, land4, land5, land6, land7, land8, land9, task_id) values

mapper.select: select count(e.id) from entity e where 1=1

select e.* from entity e
left join put p on e.pid = p.id
left join order_put op on e.pid = op.id
where 1=1

select p.put_name putName,pl.`plan_name` planName,ap.`name` posName,med.`media_name` medName, med.id medId, adver.full_name adverName, agent.full_name agentName from entity e left join put p on e.pid = p.id left join plan pl on p.pid = pl.id left join ad_position ap on p.ad_position = ap.id left join company adver on pl.adver_id = adver.id left join flow_source med on p.dx_media = med.media_uuid left join company agent on adver.aid = agent.id
where e.id = #{id}
SELECT count(T1.id) as total FROM `entity` T1

SELECT T1.id id, T1.pid putId FROM `entity` T1
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
